abstract: JPMorgan Chase has hired Matthew L. Biben, a former deputy general counsel at Bank of New York Mellon, as the top lawyer for its home lending unit.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has hired Matthew L. Biben, a former deputy general counsel at Bank of New York Mellon, as the top lawyer for its home lending unit.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Matthew L. Biben, a former senior lawyer at Bank of New York Mellon, as the general counsel of its home lending unit, as the bank revamps its mortgage operations, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Names New Senior Lawyer for Home Lending

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
